lines.i: This template contains information on the pregnancy status of the decedent.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.12"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:93)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:94)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:95)/@code="69442-2" Timing of recent pregancy related to death (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:96)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:97), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pregnancy Status (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003 DYNAMIC (CONF:98)
A code that provides information regarding whether or not the person was pregnant at the time of her death, or whether she was pregnant around the time of death. Required if the person is female and in the age range 5 to 75 years.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:94)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:95)/@code="69442-2" Timing of recent pregancy related to death (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:96)

A code that provides information regarding whether or not the person was pregnant at the time of her death, or whether she was pregnant around the time of death. Required if the person is female and in the age range 5 to 75 years.
